ðŸ“– Summary: Durdraw is a versatile ASCII and ANSI art text editor designed for Linux, macOS, and other Unix-like systems. It allows users to create and edit text-based art with features like animation support, 256 and 16 color modes, Unicode and CP437 character sets, and customizable themes, drawing inspiration from classic DOS-based editors while providing a modern, terminal-based experience.
